data.name: Skyforge: Bounty Hunter Collector's Edition
data.detailed_description:
Let the hunt begin! This Collector’s Edition unlocks the Bounty Hunter, a powerful new AOE damage-dealing class armed to the teeth with explosive weapons, plus trick anti-grav and shield gadgets. You'll also receive an exclusive Costume, Legendary Weapon, and a host of useful items:

• Class Unlock: Bounty Hunter
• Exclusive Class Costume (Color Variant)
• Exclusive Legendary Weapon
• 1 Star of Rebirth
• 5,000 Aelerium-9 Catalysts
• 1,000 Ether Catalysts
• 14 Days of Premium Subscription
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: Let the hunt begin! This Collector’s Edition unlocks the Bounty Hunter, a powerful new AOE damage-dealing class armed to the teeth with explosive weapons, plus trick anti-grav and shield gadgets. You'll also receive an exclusive Costume, Legendary Weapon, and a host of useful items:
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP Service Pack 3 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Pentium Dual CPU E2160 1.80 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600 GTS, Intel HD Graphics 3000, or ATI Radeon HD 4650
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP Service Pack 3 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4430 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 275 or ATI Radeon HD 4870
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
